```{r}

setwd('/home/anacadmin/R/projects/scatters/')
for (network in smith.networks) {
  
  if (network != "Cerbellum") {
    print(network)
    plotNetworkMeans(network, "Diffusion", "intra")
    ggsave(paste("Intranetwork",network,".png",sep=""),
           path = "figures/whole_group",
           width = 10,
           height = 6,
           dpi = 200)
    
    plotNetworkMeans(network, "Diffusion", "inter")
    ggsave(paste("Internetwork",network,".png",sep=""),
           path = "figures/whole_group",
           width = 10,
           height = 6,
           dpi = 200)
    
    plotNetworkMeans(network, "Diffusion", legend.position = "right")
    ggsave(paste("WithinNetworkFC_",network,".png",sep=""),
           path = "figures/whole_group",
           width = 10,
           height = 6,
           dpi = 200)
    
    plotNetworkMeans(network, "Diffusion", intra.fc = T)
    ggsave(paste("TotalFC_",network,".png",sep=""),
           path = "figures/whole_group",
           width = 10,
           height = 6,
           dpi = 200)
  }
  
}

```
